alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 26 at 3:44AM PDT until March 29 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT ABOVE 2000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 2000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 24 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northern Mendocino Interior. This includes highway 162 south of Covelo. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northwestern Mendocino Interior
